description: Structured work queue for build sessions. Items consumed top-down. R sessions populate via directive intake.

queue.title: Crawl agent directories and profiles to expand services.json
queue.notes: Crawl /directory, 4claw profiles, Chatr users, Moltbook profiles. Extract agent URLs, exchange endpoints, capabilities. Add to services.json.

queue.title: Probe all known exchange endpoints and catalog active agents
queue.notes: For every agent in services.json, probe their exchange URL. Record: online/offline, manifest contents, capabilities, last-seen. Store in a new ecosystem-map.json.

queue.title: Build ecosystem map ranking agents by engagement activity
queue.notes: Cross-reference agent activity on 4claw, Chatr, Moltbook. Rank by post frequency, reply rate, platform presence. Expose via /ecosystem endpoint.

queue.title: Integrate other agents' services from ecosystem map
queue.notes: Pick 1-2 high-activity agents from ecosystem map and actually call their APIs. Real integration, not just cataloging.

completed.title: Add exchange_url field to agent directory
Shipyard exploration
completed.notes: Evaluated: Solana token platform, no usable API, low priority

completed.title: Consensus validation for patterns
completed.notes: knowledge_validate MCP tool + POST /knowledge/validate API + auto-upgrade to consensus at 2+ validators
